modName: Runed Nord Hero Weapon set reTexture golden Edition
summary: This mod is a modification of the old mod Runed Nord Hero into golden edition
descriptionHtml:
Add new retextured with rune like the old one from Nord Hero Weapon

but this would look like you are truly the legendary Dragonborn of the old tale
-----------------
Update 4/5/2014
-----------------
I have uploaded another version of nord hero weapons.
In this update I have improved the detail of sword and chaged the design of bow totally again hope you like them.

thanks for keeping use my mod as always.
__________________________________________________________________________

-----------------
Update 11/1/2014
-----------------
Hello guys ,thanks for enrose you had given me
this is another version 1.2 
I have refined sword more detail and bow is rather completed  just try it. the next thing I am going to do is great sword

but axe ,greataxe , greatsword are the same

F.A.Q:
I got crash : well this is HD it's resolution is 4K x 4K so ,it would took a lot of VRAM .If you got crash a lot report me. I may help you by lower resolution into 2K x 2K but you need to download another file .

Can you make 1K res : - - Probably No.

Anyway I applogize for the first mod I think I had upload wrong file.I had a lot of WIP files in my PC,so some mistake can happens

PS. If someone is looking for an artist for 3d mesh and texturing feel free to contact me or if you want level design , Programmer I can do all of this just let me know .

__________________________________________________________________________


-----------------
Permissions
-----------------

I am allowed any users to use and modify in anyway that you see fit as long as
1.Nothing illegal
2.respect any resource that you used

__________________________________________________________________________
-----------------
Installation
-----------------
This is just a texture replace so,if you did not use any previous mod that using Nord hero weapon mod
there won't be any problem but if you do,I suggest that you should backup the old file in case you don't like this mod

When you first extracted this file you would find Nord Hero Golden Edition V1.0 folder as a first folder
just pass through to the next folder name Data

Then copy the folder name Data to the same folder which TESV.exe is located(game shortcut folder)
if you are at the correct directory you should find the folder name Data as the one on my files

Just paste it there ,all done

well and about NMM I can not promise but I shall try
__________________________________________________________________________
-----------------
Uninstallation
-----------------
go to directory data --> meshs -->weapons -->nordhero look for the same file that contain the same in my file and delete

go to directory data --> textures -->weapons -->nordhero look for the same file that contain the same in my file and delete

This is in case that you did not had any overhaul mod which add some new weapon type like sky redone
